name: Google Drive
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Drive 节点。主要用于: Access data on Google Drive

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder | 作用: The ID of the folder | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: appPropertiesUi (值: None) - A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app
propertiesUi (值: None) - A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps

useQueryString.name: useQueryString
useQueryString.description: Whether a query string should be used to filter results
useQueryString.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Query String | 作用: Whether a query string should be used to filter results | 默认值: False

queryString.name: queryString
queryString.description: Query to use to return only specific files
queryString.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query String | 作用: Query to use to return only specific files

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

queryFilters.name: queryFilters
queryFilters.description: Filters to use to return only specific files
queryFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filters to use to return only specific files | 默认值: {}

permissionsUi.name: permissionsUi
permissionsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Permissions | 默认值: {}

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - The name of the file

keepRevisionForever (值: None) - Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.
trashed (值: None) - Whether to move a file to the trash. Only the owner may trash a file.
ocrLanguage (值: None) - A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code)
parentId (值: None) - The ID of the parent to set
useContentAsIndexableText (值: None) - Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text

name.name: name
name.description: The name of this shared drive
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of this shared drive

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only contain the ID of the file. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response only contain the ID of the file. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: False

parents.name: parents
parents.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file
parents.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parents | 作用: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file | 默认值: []

driveId.name: driveId
driveId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Drive | 作用: The ID of the drive | 提示: The Google Drive drive to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False
